review: I have two of these now. One for the kids TV and one for my TV. I have another Blu-Ray player that utilizes WiFi for streaming Netflix or HULU Plus that is just plain inferior to the AppleTV. Not just the navigation, but the actual speed of streaming and drop-outs are awful on the DVD player. If you use any Apple devices, like an iPhone, Mac or iPad, the AppleTV is the way to go! Airplay works seamlessly and you can control it with the Remote App for iPhone/iPad and iPodTouch.

author: Barbara M. Molinari "Barb"

review: There is no comparison to the ease of use of this device compared to a Samsung Smart TV and the cost is less than the premium for the Smart TV. Setup is a snap, you can use your phone or iPad as a remote, and the software has Apple's trademark ease of use and sharp design. Save money by getting the dumb TV and plugging this nifty little unit into it. As a side note, the Amazon app has now been updated so you can stream Amazon video through Apple TV using your Iphone, IPad, or Mac . This is a nice addition to the built in apps for Netflix, HBO Go, ESPN, Hulu, Disney, and quite a few others.
